paper_abstract: This paper proposes a novel filtering method for removing such speckle noise from Synthetic Aperture Radar image that combines the Stationary Tree-structured Wavelet Transform (STWT) with a Bayesian wavelet estimator. Experimental results on several test images by using the proposed method show that, the proposed method yields significantly superior image quality and better Peak Signal to Noise Ratio (PSNR).
paper_title: SAR speckle reduction based on undecimated tree-structured wavelet transform
